title: T 206 Cubs Evers and Chance wanted
author: rkastner

posts.post_title: T 206 Cubs Evers and Chance wanted
posts.post_content:
I have a Tinkers but need an Evers portrait and Chance portrait. I want to matte and frame them to honor the famous Double play combination. I would prefer the condition to match my Tinkers. Thanks so much for reading this. Hopefully someone can come up with my request.
Ron
